description: No animal products. Focuses on fruits, vegetables, grains, and legumes.
Low carb and high fat. Puts the body into ketosis to burn fat for energy.
Focuses on minimizing carbohydrate intake while allowing more protein and fat.
Eliminates gluten (found in wheat, barley, rye). Important for celiac disease or sensitivity.
No meat or fish. Includes dairy and eggs. Emphasizes plant-based food.
Focus on meat, fish, fruits, and nuts. Avoids processed food and grains.
